players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Diana is dead! This is terrible. We need to be very careful and figure out who the mafia is."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Wait Bob, if you investigated Charlie, that means you're claiming to be the detective. But how do we know you're telling the truth and not the mafioso trying to frame Charlie?"
Charlie: "Bob is lying! I am the real detective and I investigated Alice last night - she is a villager. Bob must be the mafioso trying to frame me before I can reveal my findings."

You: "Both of you are claiming to be the detective, which means one of you is lying. Charlie, if you're really the detective and investigated me, then you know I'm a villager. But Bob, your claim seems rushed - why would you immediately call for a..."
Bob: "Alice, if Charlie investigated you and you're a villager, why didn't he say that in his first message? He only claimed detective after I exposed him. He's scrambling!"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
